      • mutation

        public void mutation(Population population)
        Randomly select up to mutationRate% of population for mutation.

        Ex: popSize =100, mutatioRate=10;
        10 random individuals out of 100 will be mutated

        Parameters:
        population -

      • overwriteOperation

        public Population overwriteOperation(Population population)
        Perform the overwrite function in a given population. The resulting population "newPop" will have GA.operatorRate % of new individuals and the complement from the provided population.

        Ex: Ga.popSize=10, Ga.operatorRate=50;
        The new population will have 5 new individuals (resulting from overwrite function) and 5 from the old population

        Parameters:
        population -
        Returns:
        newPop
